trans-unit.source: Represents the collection of extensibility elements used by the XML Web service.
This class cannot be inherited.
This collection can either contain instances of classes deriving from <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension>, or instances of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> class.

In a derived class, <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension> class allows users to define extensibility elements in addition to those defined in the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) specification.
Use these in your ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection if you know in advance the type of extensibility element you want to make.
Use an <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> when you do not know the format of an element in advance.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection"></xref> class.

Since many of the classes in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description> namespace expose an `Extensions` property representing a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection>, the constructor assigns a parent object corresponding to the level within the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) hierarchy where the current `ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection` is nested.
For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
The object of which this collection is a member.

Adds the specified <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref> to the end of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection"></xref>.

The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref>, passed by reference, to add to the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection"></xref>.
The zero-based index where the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref> has been added.

Returns a value indicating whether the specified <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref> is a member of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref> for which to check collection membership.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref> is a member of the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Copies the entire <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection"></xref> into a one-dimensional array of type <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref>, starting at the specified zero-based index of the target array.
An array of type <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref> serving as the destination of the copy action.
The zero-based index at which to start placing the copied collection.
Searches the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection"></xref> and returns the first element of the specified derived <xref:System.Type>.
This method searches the collection in index order, and returns only the matching element with the lowest-numbered index.
A <xref:System.Type> for which to search the collection.
If the search is successful, an object of the specified <xref:System.Type>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Searches the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection"></xref> for a member with the specified name and namespace URI.
This method searches the collection in index order, and returns the first <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> that meets the criteria of the two parameters.
The name of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> to be found.
The XML namespace URI of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> to be found.
If the search is successful, an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Searches the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection"></xref> and returns an array of all elements of the specified <xref:System.Type>.
A <xref:System.Type> for which to search the collection.
An array of <xref:System.Object> instances representing all collection members of the specified type.
Searches the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection"></xref> and returns an array of all members with the specified name and namespace URI.
The XML name attribute of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> objects to be found.
The XML namespace URI attribute of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> objects to be found.
An array of <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> instances.
Searches for the specified <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref> and returns the zero-based index of the first instance with the collection.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref> for which to search in the collection.
The zero-based index of the specified <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref>, or -1 if the element was not found in the collection.

Adds the specified <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection"></xref> at the specified zero-based index.
If the number of items in the collection already equals the collection's capacity, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted.

If the `index` parameter is equal to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>, the `extension` parameter is added to the end of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection>.
The elements after the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element.
The zero-based index at which to insert the `extension` parameter.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref> to add to the collection.
Returns a value indicating whether the specified object is used by the import process when the extensibility element is imported into the XML Web service.

This method checks whether the `item` parameter is an <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> or a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension> (or a derived class) before determining whether it is supported by the XML Web service.
An object, either of type <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref> to check for use by the import process.
if the item parameter is used; otherwise, .
Returns a value indicating whether the specified object is necessary for the operation of the XML Web service.
An object, either of type <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref>, to check whether it is necessary.
if the item parameter is required; otherwise, .
Gets or sets the value of a member of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection"></xref>.
The zero-based index of the member whose value is modified or returned.
The value of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref>.
To be added.

Removes the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection"></xref>.

The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection"></xref>.
To be added.
To be added.
